articles.title: Adriaan's top 10 reads of the day | Transnet rail chief quits, march against Pappas, World Cup crickets
articles.description: Transnet rail chief quits, march against Pappas, World Cup crickets. Here are Adriaan's top 10 reads of the day.
articles.content:
After a year-long battle by business and organised labour,
Transnet Freight Rail CEO Siza Mzimela has resigned. Her departure
follows that of Transnet CEO Portia Derby. Speaking at the Joburg Minin… [+703 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera Staff
articles.title: ‘Where’s the crowd?’: Fans deride empty stadium at Cricket World Cup opener
articles.description: Cricket fans slam organisers as the ICC Cricket World Cup gets underway amidst thousands of empty seats in Ahmedabad.
articles.content:
It was billed as the most anticipated cricket event of the year, held in the sports biggest stadium globally, in a country that is known to worship the game.
But when the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023 … [+5848 chars]

articles.author: Philippe Escande
articles.title: Coupe du monde de cricket : « L’affirmation de la nouvelle puissance de l’Inde dans le monde »
articles.description: Pour la quatrième fois, la péninsule indienne accueille la Coupe du monde de cricket.  Les sponsors se sont bousculés pour avancer leurs pions sur l’un des seuls grands pays affichant encore une forte croissance dans le monde.
articles.content:
Le stade Narendra Modi, à Ahmedabad, mercredi 4 octobre 2023. SAM PANTHAKY / AFP

articles.title: Fans bemused as England begin Cricket World Cup in almost-empty stadium despite world-beating capacity...

articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
